description: React component for executing a test script with progress simulation, log streaming, and user controls.

methods.name: appendLog
methods.description: Appends a timestamped log line to the logs array.

methods.name: startRun
methods.description: Starts the simulated execution, resets logs and progress, and updates status.

methods.name: cancelRun
methods.description: Cancels the ongoing simulation, clears interval, updates status, and shows error toast.

methods.name: resetRun
methods.description: Resets progress, logs, and status to initial state.

methods.name: statusText
methods.description: Returns a string representing the current execution status.
